desc: Spicers of Hythe have been offering Hampers of Distinction since 1926 with the finest range of Gifts and Hampers for a wide variety of occasions.

layout.text:
The Original Cake Company’s delicious treats have just been added to our huge range of corporate gifts.

With fantastic flavours from Salted Caramel to Farmhouse Fruit, find the perfect cake for anyone in our brand new collection.
